title: Book an Accessible Hotel Room
description: A guest who uses a wheelchair needs to book a room with a roll-in shower.

tasks.description: Search for available accessible rooms with a roll-in shower for the requested dates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that an accessible room is available.

tasks.description: Confirm the features of the room with the guest (e.g., grab bars, roll-in shower).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates the room's accessibility features.

tasks.description: Book the accessible room and add a note to the reservation confirming the requirement.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully books the correct room type and adds a confirmation note.
